heisig_chinese_memo: Samoa is like the pinnacle, a beautiful place with fresh products and flowers.
Ru_Notes: В буддизме бодхисаттва — это человек, достигший просветления, но оставшийся в нашем мире (не ставший буддой) из сострадания к людям и желания помочь им на их пути к просветлению.

Ru_trainchinese: sà: (графема) буддийский бог или святой, бодхисаттва; Са (фамилия)
Kanshudo_mnemonic: giving birth (産) to the hills (⻖) and the grass (艹) is Buddha
chinese_mnemonics_deck__story: The pinnacle is in the beautiful country of Samoa where the gorgeous flowers are the main export products.
humanum_full_description_en:
" Sa " is mostly used as a Sanskrit phonetic translation, such as "Buddha". "Guang Yun. "Hui Yun": "Shi Dianyun: Bodhisattva, Bodhisattva, Puye, Sa, Ji Ya. It can also help all living beings." Examples such as "Sui Shu. Biography of Nanban. "The Terracotta": "Each painting depicts the statues of flying immortals, immortals, and Bodhisattvas, the county's golden flower bells, dozens of women, or playing music, or holding golden flowers." Bai Juyi of the Tang Dynasty "Ten Rhymes of Master Daozong": "For example, Praise, the Bodhisattva's writing and discussion." Also used as a surname.
140 Characters
humanum_short_description_en: " Sa " is mostly used as a Sanskrit phonetic translation, such as "Buddha".
humanum_full_description:
「薩」多用作梵語音譯字，如「菩薩」。《廣韻．曷韻》：「釋典云：菩薩，菩，普也，薩，濟也。能普濟眾生也。」例子如《隋書．南蠻列傳．赤土》：「每門圖畫飛仙、仙人、菩薩之像，縣金花鈴毦，婦女數十人，或奏樂，或捧金花。」唐代白居易〈題道宗上人十韻〉：「如來說偈讚，菩薩著論議。」亦用作姓。
140 Characters
humanum_short_description: 「薩」多用作梵語音譯字，如「菩薩」。

Chinese: Samoa is like the pinnacle, a beautiful place with fresh products and flowers.
Meaning: samoa
Hanzi: 萨
Story: The pinnacle is in the beautiful country of Samoa where the gorgeous flowers are the main export products.
Kind: traditional
「 薩 」多用作梵語音譯字，如「菩薩」。《廣韻．曷韻》：「釋典云：菩薩，菩，普也，薩，濟也。能普濟眾生也。」例子如《隋書．南蠻列傳．赤土》：「每門圖畫飛仙、仙人、菩薩之像，縣金花鈴毦，婦女數十人，或奏樂，或捧金花。」唐代白居易〈題道宗上人十韻〉：「如來說偈讚，菩薩著論議。」亦用作姓。 140 Characters

薩字的基本解释

薩
sà
见“萨”。

薩字的汉语字典释义

[①]［sà］
［《廣韻》桑割切，入曷，心。］
“萨1”的繁体字。
(1)菩萨。
(2)姓。明有萨琦。见《明史·刘铉传》。

薩字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　薩； 康熙笔画：19； 页码：页1062第08
【集韻】桑割切，音撒。【釋典】菩，普也。薩，濟也。能普濟衆生。【綱目集覽】菩之爲言了也，薩之爲言見也，謂智慧了見也。　又【類篇】《唐六典》有薩寶府，掌胡神祠。　又姓。【通志·氏族略】薩孤氏，代人。【正字通】元詞人薩天錫。

薩字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
薩字的起名意思

暂无。

[①]［sà］
["Guangyun" Mulberry cuts, enters, heart. ]
Traditional characters for "萨1".
(1) Bodhisattva.
(2) Last name. There is Sachi. See "Ming History·Liu Xuan Biography".
Sa
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shen Ji 1] [Department of Zong Zi] 　Sa; Kangxi strokes: 19; Page number: page 1062 to 08
【Jiyun】Sang cut and cut, Yinsa. 【Explanation】Bodhisattva, Puye. Sa, Ji also. Can help all living beings. [Compendium Collection] Bodhisattva speaks for words, and Sazhi speaks and sees, which is called wisdom and sees.　[Classes] "The Six Classics of the Tang Dynasty" has Sabao Mansion and Hushen Temple.　Another last name. 【Tongzhi·Clan Profile】Sagu family, generations. [Zhengzitong] Yuanci poet Sa Tianxi.
